name: System Shutdown
description: A one-page one-shot roleplaying game. You're a badass cyberpunk data-warrior in the near future, riddled with glistening chrome and advanced drugs - but you've been betrayed by your employers, because of course you have. As your bank accounts are drained of credit and your implants start shutting down as a result, can you enact your terrible revenge on the Whisperlight Corporation while you can still walk, see, hear and perform basic tasks?
